Room.Name: Mondrake's Throne Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the massive throne room of the cloud giant Mondrake.
Room.LongDescription: The majestic cloud castle cannot compare to the powerful presence of Mondrake sitting at his throne. The vast throne room extends at least a hundred yards in every direction with Mondrake's giant throne taking up a good fifty square yards. The cloud giant king looks down upon your puny figures.
